S.FORM: Mahamadou Issoufou 4 bulad 7 demiad, Mahamadou Issoufou, u misingkiway. 1951 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Niger ayza sa ci Mahamadou Issoufou, micakat a demiad sa i 2011 a mihca 4 bulad 7 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
